name: A Nimrod and Monsters
description:
Welcome Possible Nimrod!

Do you like shooting? Do you like islands? Do you like fighting monsters? Do you like the repetitiveness of a game jam game? Well then, your going to love being a Nimrod!

Join us and the one other Nimrod in cataloguing all of 10 monsters! Explore an infinite amount of procedurally generated islands. Shoot or take pictures of any monster you want. Gather enough data to fill out the Encyclopedia of Monsters.

So come join us on this epic half-hour adventure!

(We are not liable to any harm you may receive from pestering monsters)
